name: Is Last 3 Fiscal Years
description: This value is true if the date is between the beginning of fiscal year 2 years ago from yesterday to yesterday's end of month. For example, if yesterday is June 10 in fiscal year 2022, then dates between October 1, 2019 and June 30, 2022 are set to true.
